backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods defined.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for numerous frontend source files.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file specifying API keys for OpenWeatherMap and Google Maps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base/theme variable definitions for backgrounds, text, cards, and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting page title and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling client-side navigation between all pages.
frontend/src/components/ContinentalMap.t: Interactive SVG-based continent map with hover, selection, and optional marker rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and refreshing a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Full Internet Identity auth provider and hook managing login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for light and dark ocean-themed color schemes, plus base styles and themed backgrounds.
frontend/src/lib/cityDistrictDataset.ts: Defines a dataset of major cities and districts with coordinates and includes a helper for case-insensitive, partial name lookup.
frontend/src/lib/continentDataset.ts: Provides sample environmental data for continents and a lookup function supporting direct and partial name matching.
frontend/src/lib/countryStateDataset.ts: Contains representative coordinates for major countries and US states with metadata for simple location lookup.
frontend/src/lib/environmentData.ts: Fetches environmental metrics using OpenWeather and USGS APIs, falling back to nulls and marking estimated values when data is unavailable.
frontend/src/lib/fishingZoneHeuristics.t: Computes coral health scores and derives fish availability, cyclone risk, and flood risk from environmental metrics.
frontend/src/lib/seaOceanDataset.ts: Defines a dataset of major seas and oceans with coordinates and provides a name‑based lookup function.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AuthedLandingPage.tsx: Displays a dashboard showing authenticated user identity details and logout option.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatePage.tsx: Provides a form to compute a coral health index based on environmental inputs and shows impacts and suggestions.
frontend/src/pages/CommentPage.tsx: Allows users to post, list, and delete comments associated with sea or ocean names.
frontend/src/pages/FishingZonePage.tsx: Searches for a sea, ocean, or city, fetches environmental data, computes conditions, and displays fishing-related metrics.
frontend/src/pages/GoogleMapPage.tsx: Searchable map page that looks up continents, seas, and oceans, fetches environmental data, and displays markers and details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Underwater‑themed landing page with navigation buttons linking to core app pages.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Simple login form with animated background and client‑side validation before triggering onLogin.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile settings page allowing name/DoB/gender edits and image upload, persisted in localStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, animations, and enabling plugins for the project’s ocean/baby‑blue themes.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, architecture, image requirements, and pending enhancements.
